in reference to:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Environment Variables in the group third-brain at 2022-05-12T07:40:25
item.description:
in reference to:

The values of locale (现场) categories shall be determined by a precedence (优先) order; the first condition met below determines the value: If the LC_ALL environment variable is defined and is not null , the value of LC_ALL shall be used. If the LC_* environment variable (LC_COLLATE, LC_CTYPE, LC_MESSAGES, LC_MONETARY, LC_NUMERIC, LC_TIME) is defined and is not null , the value of the environment variable shall be used to initialize the category that corresponds to the environment variable. If the LANG environment variable is defined and is not null , the value of the LANG environment variable shall be used. If the LANG environment variable is not set or is set to the empty string, the implementation-defined default locale (现场) shall be used.

item.description:

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

[[需求]]-满足-全能体验 更多的互动-满足-更多的正向反馈 在生命早期，尽可能基于全能感，鼓励[[建模欲望]]。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:36:37
item.description:
in reference to:

母亲需要婴儿去顺从自己的需要，去满足自己的要求。这对婴儿而言是一种创伤，会让婴儿的好的自体感受崩解掉，变得破碎不堪，为了应对这种破碎的痛苦，婴儿发展出一种防御，即去照顾和迎合妈妈，让那个失去活力的妈妈重新活过来。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

婴儿得惯着，强迫他们学会顺从和适应就是一种创伤。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:37:57
item.description:
in reference to:

婴儿被诱惑去顺从，于是出现顺从的虚假自体来响应环境的要求，而婴儿似乎也接受了这些虚假自体。透过虚假自体，婴儿建立的一套虚假的关系，这种顺从，将导致婴儿与真实自体保持一种隔离状态。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

虚假自体可以有效的适应环境，但这与婴儿的真实状态是有隔离的。是一种刻意忽视。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:41:42
item.description:
in reference to:

假自体掩藏着一种真正的痛，真实自体没有权利被提及，想起这些对他而言是非常痛苦的。因为他感到被这种假的姿态囚禁了。对他而言，在日常生活中，不管和什么人在一起时，要做到自发和自然都是不可能的。那些被假自体支配的人可能会看起来很成功，但是他的内在会觉得空洞和无意义。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

社会的价值观扭曲与暴力的共识，导致大家形成假自体，并进一步追求成功，但最后也依然不快乐。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:42:13
item.description:
in reference to:

在所有正常发展的人身上，假自体对应于社会生活的规则、礼貌，假自体让我们更加适应社会。真自体需要一定量的假自体才能继续存在下去，假自体有一个非常重要的正面功能，它在环境的苛求下掩盖真自体。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the group third-brain at 2022-06-05T05:05:35
item.description:
in reference to:

记忆：重复回忆问题；时间间隔随着回答成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 过程的流畅性：重复完成简短练习，有许多变体；时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月；将卡片标记为「有成果」或「无成果」，以扩大/缩小时间间隔 习惯养成：重复简短的反思卡片，可能根据顺序改变，应用于你的日常经验；间隔默认扩大，但可以放缓 阅读队列：一系列 PDF，标签页，书本，总在变换：如果一段时间内忽略某些内容，它就会暂离一周，之后是一个月；比如说「我现在读够什么了」，这东西就会几天之内再次呈现；说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Automating Read It Later Articles to DEVONthink - GeekDad in the group third-brain at 2022-08-27T04:50:54
item.description:
in reference to:

So when you see something you want to dive into later when you have a bit more time… you have to put it somewhere. That is where a “read-it-later” service like Pocket or Instapaper comes in. Basic features with these services are free, but if you want more advanced features like “search” you have to pay. In the case of Pocket, it will cost you $4.99 a month or $44.99 a year to keep a permanent library of saved articles and be able to search the content of those articles.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Folder Structure to Maximize Writing with Devonthink Pro — Workflows in Personal and Professional Productivity in the group third-brain at 2022-09-03T14:29:11
item.description:
in reference to:

Although at one point I had all my information on manuscripts in a single DTP database, over the last year I have maintained separate databases; one for PDFs, another for my annotations.I accomplish this by having separate folders in Dropbox. After extracting my annotations from Highlights.app, I place the exported files in their own folder. Once a month, I export all the PDFs in my Paper’s Library to their own Dropbox folder. I use a Hazel script to throw away any duplicate PDFs in the Dropbox folder. I index (not import) the annotations folder into one DTP database, and index my PDFs into another.
